Translations.Text: Z Nym yavlyaye soboyu znannya pro Hodynu (kinetsʹ svitu). Niyaki frukty ne z'yavlyayutʹsya z yikhnʹoho sheaths, ne budʹ-yaka zhinka zbahnutʹ abo dayutʹ narodzhennya, bez Yoho znannya. Denʹ prybude koly Vin prosytʹ yikh: "De tsi idoly shcho vy vstanovlyuyetesʹ bilya Meni?" Vony skazhutʹ, "My proholoshuyemo do Vas shcho zhodnykh z nas ne daye svidchennya shcho
idoly vony idolized vidmovlyatʹsya vid nykh, ta vony zdiysnyatʹ shcho tam budutʹ ni vtecha
lyudsʹke isnuvannya nikoly ne stomlyuye blahayuchykh nazavzhdy rechey. Ta koly neshchastya befalls yo, vin povertaye despondent, rozpachlyvyy

Ta koly my blahoslovlyayemo yoho pislya toho yak zaznavaty deyakoho neshchastya, vin kazhe, "Tse nalezhytʹ meni. YA ne vvazhayu, shcho Hodyna kolysʹ prybude proyty. Navitʹ yakshcho ya vertayusʹ do moho Lorda, ya znaydu u Yo krashchi rechi." Naybilʹsh zvychayno, my poinformuyemo disbelievers vsikh yikhnikh pratsʹ, ta zdiysnymo yikh do suvoroho retribution
Koly my blahoslovlyayemo lyudsʹkyy buduchy, vin prohanyaye, ta vidnosytʹ dali ta dali daleko, ta koly vin zaznaye budʹ-yakoho affliction, vin blahaye holosno
Proholoshuyutʹ: "Shcho yakshcho tse spravdi z BOHA, todi vy vyrishyte do vidmovy tse? Khto dali astray nizh khto vyrishatʹ protystavyty tse
My pokazhemo yim nashi dokazy u obriyu, ta v mezhakh sebe, do vony zdiysnyuyutʹ shcho tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu. Vash Lord ne dostatniy tomu shcho svidok vsikh rechey
Diysno, vony ye doubtful pro zustrichayuchoho yikhnʹoho Lorda. Vin znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
M
Q
Nadykhayutʹ vas, ta tsi pered tym, yak vy, BOH, Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
Yomu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta vse na zemli, ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysoko, Velykyy

nebo nad nymy mayzhe shatter, z povahy dlya Nʹoho, ta pokhvala anheliv ta glorify yikhniy Lord, ta vony prosyatʹ forgiveness dlya tsykh na zemli. Absolyutno, BOH yavlyaye soboyu Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Tsey khto vstanovlyuvaly inshykh lordiv bilya Yoho, BOH yavlyaye soboyu Odyn vidpovidayuchyy za nykh; vy ne yikhniy prybichnyk

My takym chynom vidkryvayemo do vas arabsʹkykh Quran shchob poperedyty tsentralʹnu spilʹnotu ta vsyu navkolo tse, ta shchob poperedyty pro Denʹ Sklykayuchoho tse nemynucho. Deyakyy zakinchatʹsya u Nebesakh, ta deyakykh u Pekli
Mav BOHA willed, Vin mih zrobyly yim odnu spilʹnotu. Ale Vin vykupovuye u Yoho myloserdya whomever Vin wills. Yak dlya porushnykiv, vony ne mayutʹ maystra, ne helper
vony znayshly inshykh lordiv bilya Yoho? BOH yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky Lorda ta Maystra. Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto resurrects mertvyy, ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu Omnipotent
Yakshcho vy dysputuyete budʹ-yaka chastyna tsʹoho povidomlennya, vyrok dlya toho, shchob robyty tse vidpochyvaye z BOHOM. Takyy BOH miy Lord. U Yo ya doviryayu, ta yomu ya pidkoryayusya

Initiator neba ta zemli. Vin stvoryuvav dlya vas z chysla sebe podruzhzhya - ta takozh dlya tvaryn. Vin takym chynom zabezpechuye vas z zasobamy prymnozhytysya. YE nichoho shcho ne dorivnyuye Yomu. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Seer
Yomu nalezhytʹ absolyutnomu kontrolyu neba ta zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zbilʹshuye zapobizhni zakhody whomever Vin wills, abo zmenshuye tse. Vin znaye tsilkom vsi rechi

Vin ukhvalyv dlya vas ta zhe relihiya ukhvalena dlya Noah, ta shcho my nadykhnuly do vas, ta shcho my ukhvalyly dlya Abraham, Moses, ta Isus: "Vy budete uphold tsya odna relihiya, ta ne dilyte tse." Idol worshipers bude duzhe obrazhatysya shcho vy zaproshuyete yikh zrobyty. BOH vykupovuye Sebe whomever Vin wills; Vin keruye do Sebe tilʹky tsey khto povnistyu pidkoryayutʹsya

Ironichno, vony rozpalysya u sekty tilʹky pislya znannya prybuly yim, zavdyaky revnoshcham ta oburennyu sered sebe. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya predetermined rishennya z vashoho Lorda respite yim fora vyznacheni tymchasovi, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno. Diysno, piznishi heneratsiyi khto uspadkuvav svyate pysannya ye povnyy sumniviv

Tse ye shcho vy budete propoviduvaty, ta steadfastly budete pidtrymaty shcho vy nakazuyetesʹ shchob zrobyty, ta ne sliduyete za yikhnimy bazhannyamy. Ta proholoshuyutʹ: "YA viryu v vsim svyatym pysannyu poslanym vnyz BOHOM. YA buv nakazanyy shchob pryymaty rishennya sered vas equitably. BOH ye nash Lord ta vash Lord. My mayemo nashi spravy ta vy mayete vashi spravy. Nemaye arhumentu mizh namy ta vamy. BOH zbere nas vsikh razom; yomu yavlyaye soboyu ostatochnu dolyu
Tsey khto sperechayutʹsya pro BOHA, pislya toho yak otrymuvaty Yoho povidomlennya, yikhniy arhument znyshchuyetʹsya u yikhnʹomu Lordi. Vony zaznaly osudu, ta zasluzhyly suvoryy retribution
BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto poslav vnyz svyate pysannya, shchob dostavyty pravdu ta zakon. Dlya vsi shcho vy znayete, Hodyna (Denʹ Vyroku) mozhete buty duzhe blyzʹkyy

Kydayutʹ vyklyk tse - tsey khto ne viryatʹ v tse. Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ, vony pikluyutʹsya pryblyzno tse, ta vony znayutʹ shcho tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu. Absolyutno, tsey khto zaperechuyutʹ Hodynu poyikhaly daleko astray
BOH znaye tsilkom vsikh Yoho stvorinnya; Vin zabezpechuye dlya whomever Vin wills. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Potuzhnyy, Mohutniy
Whoever shukaye vynahorod U maybutnʹomu, my mnozhymo vynahorody dlya nʹoho. Ta whoever shukaye materialiv tse svit, my dayemo yomu zvidty, todi vin ne otrymuye payovyy vnesok u U maybutnʹomu

Vony sliduyutʹ za idolamy kotrymy ukhvalyuyutʹ dlya nykh relihiyni zakony nikoly ne upovnovazheni BOHOM. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya predetermined rishennya, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno. Diysno, porushnyky zaznaly bolisnoho retribution

Vy pobachyte porushnykiv pilkuvalysʹ pro vse vony zdiysnyly; vse povernetʹsya ta peresliduyutʹ yikh. Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhaly ta pryviv spravedlyve zhyttya, vony budutʹ u parku Rayu. Vony otrymayutʹ shchob ni vony bazhayutʹ z yikhnʹoho Lorda. Tse yavlyaye soboyu velyke blahoslovennya

Tse yavlyaye soboyu harnu novynu z BOHA do Yoho sluzhbovtsiv shcho vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. Skazhitʹ, "ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty. YA zapytuvaty kozhnyy z vas popikluvatysya pro vashykh vlasnykh rodychiv." Budʹ khto khto spravedlyva robota, my mnozhymo yoho vynahorodu dlya tse. BOH Forgiver, Appreciative

vony kazhuchyy, "Vin (Rashad) vyhotovyly brekhnyu pro BOHA!"? Yakshcho BOH willed, Vin mih opechataly vash rozum, ale BOH styraye falsehood ta zatverdzhuye pravdu z Yoho slovamy. Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vyznaye kayattya z Yoho sluzhbovtsiv, ta vidsylaye hrikhy. Vin znaye tsilkom vse vy
Vidpovidayuchyy yomu tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. Vin bude yim zlyvy z Yoho blahoslovennyam. Yak dlya disbelievers, vony zaznaly suvoroho retribution

Yakshcho b BOH zbilʹshyv zapobizhni zakhody Yoho sluzhbovtsi, vony by porushyly na zemli. Tse chomu Vin posylaye tse akuratno obmiryuvav whomever Vin wills. Vin ye tsilkom Cognizant ta Seer Yoho sluzhbovtsiv
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye vnyz doshch pislya vony despaired, ta rozpovsyudzhuye Yoho myloserdya. Vin yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky Keruvaty, Naybilʹsh Praiseworthy
Sered Yoho dokaziv yavlyaye soboyu stvorennya neba ta zemli, ta stvorinnya Vin rozpovsyudzhuyetʹsya u nykh. Vin vmiye sklykaty yikh, koly Vin wills
Budʹ shcho pohanyy shcho vidbuvayetʹsya do vy ye naslidok vashykh vlasnykh sprav, ta Vin ohlyadaye bahato (vashykh hrikhiv)
Vy mozhete nikoly ne vtikty, ta vy nikhto ne mayete bilya BOHA yak Lord ta Mayster
Sered Yoho dokaziv yavlyayutʹ soboyu korabelʹ shcho parus more z parusom lyublyatʹ prapory
Yakshcho Vin willed, Vin mih stilled viter, lyshayuchi yim neporushni na vershyni vody. Tse - dokazy dlya tsykh khto steadfast, appreciative
Vin mozhe vynyshchyty yikh, yak naslidok yikhnikh vlasnykh pratsʹ. Zamistʹ tsʹoho, Vin ohlyadaye bahato (yikhnikh hrikhiv)
Tsey khto sperechayutʹsya proty nashykh dokaziv znayde shcho vony ne mayutʹ bazy
Shchob ni vy dayetesʹ ni bilʹsh nizh tymchasovyy material tsʹoho zhyttya. Shcho BOH volodiye daleko krashche ta everlasting, dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta dovira u yikhnʹomu Lordi
Vony unykayutʹ velykykh hrikhiv ta poroku, ta koly roz·hnivani vony probachayutʹ

Vony vidpovidayutʹ do yikhnʹoho Lorda zauvazhuyuchy Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat). Yikhni spravy musyatʹ vyrishuyutʹsya piznishe konsulʹtatsiya sered sebe, ta z nashykh umov yim vony dayutʹ (do dobrodiynosti)
Koly velyka nespravedlyvistʹ befalls yim, vony zakhyshchayutʹ yikhni prava
Khocha spravedlyvyy requital dlya nespravedlyvosti ye retribution ekvivalenta, tsey khto probachayutʹ ta pidtrymuyutʹ righteousness nahorodzhuyutʹsya BOHOM. Vin ne lyubytʹ unjust
Zvychayno, tsey khto zakhyshchayutʹ yikhni prava, koly nespravedlyvistʹ befalls yim, ne zdiysnyuyutʹ budʹ-yaku pomylku
nepravylʹni ye tsey khto obroblyayutʹ lyudey nespravedlyvo, ta vdayutʹsya do ahresiyi bez provokatsiyi. Tsey zaznaly bolisnoho retribution
Vdayutʹsya do terpinnya ta forgiveness viddzerkalyuye virnu sylu kharakteru
Whomever BOH posylaye astray nikoly ne znayde budʹ-yakoho inshoho lorda, ta vy pobachyte takykh porushnykiv, koly vony bachatʹ retribution, kazhuchy, my 'Mozhemo otrymaty inshyy shans

Vy pobachyte , shcho vony zustrichayetʹsya z tse, prynyzhenym ta debased, ta dyvlyachyy, vse shche probuyuchyy shchob unyknuty dyvlyatʹsya. Tsey khto povirenyy proholosytʹ: realʹnyy losers ye tsey khto zahubyly yikhni dushi ta yikhni sim'yi na Dni Resurrection. Porushnyky zasluzhyly everlasting retribution
Tam budutʹ niyaki soyuznyky ne dopomohty yim proty BOHA. Whomever BOH posylaye astray budutʹ spromozhnyy nikoly keruvatysya
Vy budete vidpovisty do vashoho Lorda pered tym, yak denʹ prybuvaye kotryy ukhvalyuyetʹsya nemynuchyy BOHOM. Tam bude niyakyy prytulok dlya vas na shcho dnya, ne prybichnyka

Yakshcho vony prohanyayutʹ, my ne poslaly vam yak yikhniy okhoronetsʹ. Vasha yedyna misiya dostavlyaye povidomlennya. Koly my zlyva lyudsʹki istoty z myloserdyam, vony stayutʹ hordym, ta koly neshchastya afflicts yim, yak naslidok yikhnikh vlasnykh sprav, lyudsʹki istoty povertayutʹ u disbelievers
Do BOHA nalezhytʹ suverenitetu neba ta zemli. Vin stvoryuye shchob ni Vin wills, daruvannya dochky whomever Vin wills, ta daruvannya syny whomever Vin wills
Abo, Vin mozhe maty muzhchyn ta zhinok odruzhuyutʹsya odyn odnoho, todi nadayutʹ whomever Vin wills sterylʹnyy. Vin Omniscient, Omnipotent

Niyakyy lyudsʹkyy buduchy ne mozhe peredaty z BOHOM krim cherez natkhnennya, abo zzadu bar'yer, abo posylayuchy kur'yeru cherez komu Vin vidkryvaye yakyy Vin wills. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysoko, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

Otzhe, my nadykhnuly do vas vidkryttya proholoshuyuchi nashi zapovidi. Vy ne maly ideyi pro svyate pysannya, abo vira. Dosi, my zrobyly tse beacon shchob keruvaty whomever my vybyrayemo z chysla nashykh sluzhbovtsiv. Bezsumnivno, vy keruyete u pryamomu shlyakhu
shlyakh BOHA, komu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Absolyutno, vsi materialy kontrolyuyutʹsya BOHOM
M
Ta vysvitlyuyuche svyate pysannya
My nadaly tse arabsʹki Quran, shcho vy mozhete zrozumity
Tse zberihayetʹsya z namy v oryhinali mayster, pochesnyy ta povnyy wisdom
my tilʹky Musymo proihnoruvaty toy fakt, shcho vy porushyly mezhi
My poslaly bahato proroka do poperednikh heneratsiy
Kozhnyy chas prorok poyikhav yim, vony ridiculed yo
Otzhe, my vynyshchyly lyudey shcho buly navitʹ bilʹshe potuzhni nizh tsey. My takym chynom vstanovlyuyemo pryklady z poperednikh spilʹnot
Yakshcho b vy poprosyly yikh, "Khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu," vony by skazaly, Mohutniy, Omniscient utvoryv yikh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas, ta stvoryuvaly dlya vas dorohy tam, shcho vy mozhete proslidkuvaty za pravom shlyakh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye vnyz z neba voda, u tochniy miri, shchob vidnovyty mertvi zemli therewith. Analohichno, vy budete resurrected
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vsi riznovydy, paramy (muzhchyna ta zhinka), ta Vin stvoryuvav dlya vas korabelʹ ta domashna khudoba yikhaty
Tomu shcho vy spyrayetesya na vershynu z nykh, vy budete otsinyty take blahoslovennya z vashoho Lorda, ta kazhete, "Slava musytʹ khto pidkoryv tse dlya nas. My ne mohly prokontrolyuvaly yikh sobi
My ostatochno vertayemo do nashoho Lorda
Vony navitʹ pryznachyly dlya Nʹoho aktsiya z Yoho vlasnoho stvorennya! Bezsumnivno, lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye hlyboko unappreciative
Vin vybrav z chysla Yoho dochok stvorennya dlya Sebe, toy chas, yak blahoslovlyayuchy vas z synamy
Koly odyn z nykh dayetʹsya novynu (dochky) tomu shcho vony zayavyly dlya naybilʹshoyi Dobrozychlyvoyi, yoho oblychchya temnytʹsya z neshchastyam ta hnivom
(Yak kazhutʹ,) "Shcho harnyy pro offspring shcho vykhovuyetʹsya shchob buty krasyvyy, ta ne mozhe dopomoha u viyni
Vony zayavyly shcho anhely, khto sluzhbovtsi naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi, zhinky! Vony zasvidchyly yikhnye stvorennya? Yikhni pretenziyi zapysuyutʹsya, ta vony budutʹ prosytysya
Vony navitʹ skazaly, "Yakshcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy willed, my by ne obozhnyuvaly yikh." Vony ne mayutʹ bazy dlya takoyi pretenziyi; vony tilʹky prypuskayutʹ
my daly yim knyhu pered tse, ta vony upholding tse
Sprava v tomu, shcho: vony skazaly, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv vykonuyuchi pevni vpravy, ta my slidkuyemo u yikhnikh krokakh
Nezminno, koly my poslaly warner do budʹ-yakoyi spilʹnoty, lidery, kotra spilʹnota skazhe, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv nastupni pevni vpravy, ta my prodovzhymo u yikhnikh krokakh
(kur'yer) by skazav, 'Shcho yakshcho b ya by prynis do vas krashche kerivnytstvo nizh shcho vy uspadkuvaly z vashykh batʹkiv?" Vony by skazaly, "My disbelievers u povidomlenni vy prynesly
Otzhe, my requited yim. Prymitka naslidky dlya rejectors
Abraham skazanyy yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "ya zrikayusya shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Tilʹky kotryy vystupyv z initsiatyvoyu meni mozhe keruvaty meni
Tsey pryklad (Abraham) buv nadanyy everlasting urok dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy; mozhlyvo vony vykupovuyutʹ yikhni dushi
Diysno, ya dav tsym lyudyam ta yikhnim predkam dostatni mozhlyvosti, todi pravda prybula yim, ta roz'yasnyayucha kur'yeru
Koly pravda prybula yim, vony skazaly, "Tse zacharuvannya, ta my disbelievers tam
Vony skazaly, "Yakby tilʹky tse Quran bulo poslane vnyz cherez inshu lyudynu z dvokh spilʹnot (Mecca abo Yathrib) khto ye vydatnyy

vony shcho pryznachayutʹ vashe myloserdya Lorda? My pryznachyly yikhni aktsiyi u tse zhyttya, pidnimayuchy deyaki z nykh nad inshymy u ranhakh, aby dozvolyty yim sluzhymo odyn odnym. Myloserdya z vashoho Lorda daleko krashche nizh budʹ-yaki materialʹni vony mozhutʹ prykhovaty

Yakshcho tse ne shcho vsi lyudy mozhutʹ staty (disbelieving) congregation, my by harantuvaly kozhnomu kotromu disbelieves u naybilʹshykh Dobrozychlyvykh osobnyakakh z sribnymy dakhamy, ta skhody na kotri vony mohly pidnyatysya
Yikhni osobnyaky by mayutʹ vrazhayuchi bramy, ta rozkishne vbrannya
Takozh bahato prykrashaye. Vesʹ tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu tymchasovi materialy tse nyzʹko dovichnoho. U maybutnʹomu - u vashomu Lordi - ye daleko krashche dlya spravedlyvyy
Budʹ khto khto disregards povidomlennya naybilʹshykh Dobrozychlyvykh, my pryznachayemo chorta buty yoho stalyy kompanyon
Taki kompanyony vidvedutʹ yikh z shlyakhu, vse shche roblyatʹ yim vvazhayutʹ, shcho vony keruyutʹsya
Koly vin prybuvaye pered tym, yak ny vin skazhe, "O ya bazhayu vy yak daleko z meni tomu shcho dva skhodu. Shcho neshchasnyy kompanyon
Tse ne bude console vy na shcho denʹ, tomu shcho porushnyky, shcho obydva vy podilyte u retribution
Mozhete vy robyte hlukhyy chuyete; vy mozhete zrobyty zavisku dyvytesʹ, abo tsey khto mozhe ye daleko astray
Chy my dozvolyayemo vy vmyrayete pered tse abo ne, my budemo bezsumnivno requite yim
Abo, my mozhemo pokazaty vam (retribution) my poobitsyaly dlya nykh. My ye u povnomu kontroli za nymy
Vy budete steadfastly propoviduvaty shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do vas; vy mayete ratsiyu shlyakh
Tse ye povidomlennya dlya vas ta vashykh lyudey; vsi vy budete dopytuvatysya
Pereviryayemo kur'yeriv my poslaly pered tym, yak vy: my kolysʹ pryznachyly budʹ-yakykh inshykh bohiv - bilya naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi - shchob obozhnyuvatysya
Napryklad, my poslaly Moses z nashymy dokazamy Pharaoh ta yoho elders, proholoshuyuchy: "YA ye kur'yer z Lorda vsesvitu
Koly vin pokazav yim nashi dokazy, vony smiyalysya z nykh
Kozhnyy znak my pokazaly yim buly bilʹshi nizh pered tse. My afflicted yim z chumoyu, mozhlyvo vony kayutʹsya
Vony skazaly, "O vy charivnyk, blahayete vashoho Lorda vid nashoho imeni (relieve tsya chuma), z vy mayete dohovir z Nym; my budemo todi keruvatysya
Ale yak tilʹky my relieved yikhniy affliction, vony pereyshly
Pharaoh oholoshenyy do yoho lyudey, "O moyi lyudy, ya ne volodiyu tsaryuvannyam nad Yehyptom, ta tsi techuchi richky nalezhatʹ meni? Vy ne dyvytesʹ
Kotryy kozhnyy krashche; meni abo shcho odyn khto nyzʹko ta mozhe ledve rozmovlyaty
Yak prybuvayutʹ vin ne volodiye skarbom zolota; yak prybuvaty anhely ne suprovodzhuyutʹ yoho
Vin takym chynom obduryv yoho lyudey, ta vony pidkorylysya yomu; vony buly bezputni lyudy
Koly vony nastiylyvo prodovzhuvaly protystavlyayutʹ nas, my pokaraly yikh ta potopyly yikh vsikh
My nadaly yim precedent ta pryklad dlya inshykh
Koly syn Mary buv protsytovanyy yak pryklad, vashi lyudy disregarded tse
Vony skazaly, tse krashche obozhnyuyutʹ nashykh bohiv, abo shchob obozhnyuyutʹ yoho?" Vony skazaly tse tilʹky sperechatysya z vamy. Diysno, vony lyudy shcho pryyednalysya do opozytsiyi
Vin ne buv bilʹsh nizh sluzhbovetsʹ komu my blahoslovenni, ta my poslaly yomu yak pryklad dlya Ditey Izrayilya
Yakshcho my willed, my mohly zrobyly vam anhely khto zaselyayete ta vidtvoryuyete na zemli

Vin musytʹ sluzhyty yak marker dlya toho, shchob znaty kinetsʹ svitu, takym chynom vy mozhete bilʹshe ne havanʹ budʹ-yakyy sumniv pro tse. Vy budete proslidkuvaty Meni; tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
Dozvolyayete ne chort vidkhylyayete vas; vin ye vash naybilʹsh revnyy voroh
Koly Isus poyikhav z dokazamy, vin skazav, "ya prynoshu do vas wisdom, ta shchob roz'yasnyty deyaki z materialiv u kotrykh vy dysputuyete. Vy budete BOH povahy ta pidkoryayetesya meni
BOH miy Lord ta vash Lord, vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho yedynyy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
